title: Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set, 23.6inch Wreath and 8.8 Feet Garland with Pines Cones, Berry Clusters, Frosted Branches, 100 LED Warm Lights for Indoor Outdoor Christmas Decorations
descriptions:
Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set

Thank you for checking our product. We are factory supplier. This set include 1 wreath and 1 garland. No assembly needed.

Main size:
- Wreath diameter: 23.6 inches
- Garland length: 8.8 feet

Design details:
- Snowflake pine needle branches
- Two types of pine cones
- Red berry clusters
- Frosted branches look like winter
- 100 warm LED lights

Light and power:
- Total 100 LED warm lights
- Power by 3 AA batteries (batteries not included)
- Timer function: 6 hours on, 18 hours off, repeat every day

Materials and safety:
- Sturdy high quality materials
- Hypoallergenic
- Fireproof pins

Use and care:
- For indoor and outdoor use
- Good for wall, door, fireplace, living room, bedroom, dining room, windows
- No need water, low maintenance, do not fade
- Strong and durable for many seasons

Service:
- Warranty 365 days
- Customer service 24 hours

We make this set to be simple to use, with warm light and natural winter look. Please contact us if any question. We answer fast and try our best to help. Thank you for your trust.
